IAudioPlayback.ixx

This file defines the published interface for audio playback.

IAudioFrame

Defines interface used to playback of audio

Module

import Audio.AudioPlay.IAudioPlayback;

IAudioPlayback

Defines interface used to playback of audio

Module

import Audio.AudioPlayback.IAudioPlayback;

Functions

IAudioFrame* 
pFrame
) = 0

Plays an audio buffer.

Parameters

IAudioFrame*

audio buffer to play

uint8_t* 
pData,
uint32_t

) = 0

Plays an audio buffer.

Parameters

int 
frequency
) = 0

Plays a tone at the specified frequency for 1 second.

Parameters

int

float 
volume
) = 0

Parameters

CreateAudioPlayback

int 
samplingRate,
int 
bitsPerSample,
int 
numChannels
)

Creates a XAudio device for playing back audio

Parameters

int

int

numChannels
